channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 08/07/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Refined call log layout and added visibility into the responsible agent for each call Improved workspace list behavior to hide UI when no invitations are present Added user activity logging during voice calls Fixed the dropdown menu UI overlapping issue Fixed issue preventing proper hang-up of inbound calls 07/31/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Improved contact label page and added conversation label feature Enhanced call tracking logs with status tracking functionality Improved phone number validation to support Argentina WhatsApp mobile number format Completed migration of Workspace API Key and event notification pages Fixed TwiML parsing error for outbound calls that caused call failures 7/24/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added auto-answer feature for incoming calls to help agents handle calls more efficiently Added status change logging for live agents Added backend support for setting agent skills and assigning corresponding IVR menus Improved CSV contact import to support Ctrl+M as a line terminator Fixed issue with blank page display in some cases 7/17/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added support for sending WhatsApp HSM campaigns with titles and multimedia files (images, documents, videos) Added mobile call settings for making and receiving calls Added a Skills page to create and assign skill groups Added user status overview in the member settings page Improved mobile interface for workspace browsing Fixed issue during WhatsApp binding 7/10/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added support for attaching images, documents, videos, and titles in WhatsApp campaigns.
